all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Seek ye; and keep all your pledges one with another; and covet not that which is thy brother’s.
Doctrine and Covenants 136:20
Quote of the Day
"As you bind up the wounds of those in need, the Lord’s power will sustain you."
President Henry B. Eyring | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
